metadata.title: USN-4567-1 -- OpenDMARC vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that OpenDMARC is prone to a signature-bypass vulnerability with multiple "From:" addresses. An attacker could use it to bypass spam and abuse filters.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4567-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libopendmarc-dev - 1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1 rddmarc - 1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1 opendmarc - 1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1 libopendmarc2 - 1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
